## RumInitConfiguration.allowedTracingUrls property

A list of request URLs used to inject tracing headers. See <a href="https://docs.datadoghq.com/real_user_monitoring/platform/connect_rum_and_traces/?tab=browserrum">Connect RUM and Traces</a> for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
allowedTracingUrls?: Array<MatchOption | TracingOption> | undefined;
```
